response_text:
Here’s the full menu from Druid Garden, featuring a variety of dishes across different categories:

### Bar Nibbles Non-veg
- **Crispy Chicken** - Juicy chicken pieces coated in a crunchy, seasoned batter, fried to golden perfection. (₹440.00, Rating: 4.5)
- **Chicken Wings** - Available in various flavors: PERI PERI, SPICY GARLIC, KOREAN GOCHUCHANG, and more. (₹470.00, Rating: 4.3)
- **Schezwan Chicken Lollipop** - Crispy chicken lollipops marinated in a spicy marinade, tossed in a tangy Schezwan sauce. (₹440.00, Rating: 3.1)

### Bar Nibbles Veg
- **Fried Okra Slivers** - Okra slivers coated with gram flour & spices, fried. (₹245.00, Rating: 5.0)
- **Chilli Cheese Naan** - Tandoori naan stuffed with cheese & chilli, served with sour cream. (₹295.00, Rating: 4.8)
- **Peanut Masala** - Salted peanuts tossed with onions, tomatoes & spices, lime juice. (₹265.00, Rating: 4.4)

### Burger & Sandwich
- **Pulled Pork Sandwich** - Pulled smoked pork shoulder with in-house BBQ sauce and slaw. (₹510.00, Rating: 4.3)
- **Smash Beef Burger** - Seasoned beef patty with caramelized onion and cheddar melt. (₹510.00, Rating: 4.2)
- **Southern Fried Chicken Burger** - Crispy fried chicken fillet with fresh toppings. (₹470.00, Rating: 3.6)

### Desserts
- **Hazelnut Chocolate Cake** - Rich chocolate and toasted hazelnuts layered with chocolate ganache. (₹430.00, Rating: 2.7)
- **Tres Leches** - Classic milk cake. (₹430.00)

### Dimsum - Steamed
- **Veg Chilli Basil Dimsum** - Zucchini, carrot, basil, and more. (₹295.00)
- **Spicy Chicken Dimsum** - Chicken, scallions, and chili. (₹395.00)

### Grill - Beef
- **T-bone Steak** - Grilled T-bone steak with mixed green salad and roasted potato. (₹1420.00, Rating: 4.8)
- **Grilled Beef Medallions** - Filet mignon with beef jus and grilled mushrooms. (₹920.00, Rating: 4.6)

### Large Plates - Asian Rice & Noodles
- **Jasmine Rice** - Fragrant and aromatic rice. (₹260.00, Rating: 4.8)
- **Udon Noodles In Black Pepper Sauce** - Thick udon noodles stir-fried in savory black pepper sauce. (₹510.00, Rating: 4.6)

### Large Plates - Indian Non-veg
- **Chettinad Chicken Curry** - Tender chicken cooked with freshly roasted spices. (₹460.00, Rating: 4.8)
- **Butter Chicken** - Tandoori chicken in creamy makhani gravy. (₹460.00, Rating: 3.0)

### Pasta & Risotto
- **Chicken Ravioli** - In-house ravioli stuffed with roasted chicken. (₹490.00, Rating: 4.7)
- **Spaghetti Carbonara** - Spaghetti with a creamy sauce and bacon. (₹540.00, Rating: 4.4)

### Pizza Non-veg
- **Pepperoni** - Tomato sauce, mozzarella, and pork pepperoni. (₹620.00, Rating: 4.0)
- **Wood Smoked Chicken** - Smoked chicken with homemade tomato sauce. (₹595.00)

### Salad
- **Raw Mango And Papaya Salad** - Traditional Thai salad with a choice of satay. (₹345.00, Rating: 5.0)
- **Burrata Salad** - Creamy burrata cheese with seasonal ingredients. (₹425.00)

This is just a selection of the menu items available. If you have specific preferences or dietary restrictions, let me know, and I can provide more tailored recommendations!
